name: Super American Football Hero
description:
Download this amazing american football game to feel like a true running back dodging as fast as possible until you score a touchdown.

If you love american football games and their teams this is the game you've been waiting for!

Are you ready to be the best running of this awesome american football game?

As you go faster and further on the field you will win cash and you'll be able to buy better and faster players! Win the game and the league buying the best players on this awesome football game! Become the campion in this awesome competition!

You can do close shaves running very close to other players and you will win more points and more cash!

There's no time to lose! It’s game time! Choose your team and show everybody that no one can reach you!

◉ KEY FEATURES◉

- A running of every team in the league!
- Very simple controls!
- Incredible graphics!
- Leaderboards and achievements!
- Free!

◉ GAMEPLAY ◉

- Tilt or Touch to turn
- Touch accelerate button to run faster
- Touch brake button to slow down

◉ TIPS ◉

- The faster you run the more points you get
- When running fast, run very close to other players to do a close shave
- If you do close shaves fast, you can do combos and win more points and more cash

Have endless fun by downloading this American Football Game.

Do not forget to give us a review!
